title: Cooper Hewitt Launches Campaign to Take Design in the Classroom Program Nationwide (Smithsonian Institution)
text: ( Source : Smithsonian Institution ) Cooper Hewitt , Smithsonian Design Museum announced today a new campaign initiative to take its Design in the Classroom program, which introduces classes K-12 to design thinking and learning through
